result.arabic_text: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطۡغَيۡتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ
result.translation: Shetani yamwama hafi mu kumwosha nabi, izomwihakana maze ivuge iti: “Mana yacu Rurema Allah! Sinigeze ndamuhubisha, ariko yari asanzwe ari mu muzimagiza uri kure cane y’ukuri”.
